 Kali::
Kali did a nice smile, She didn't often do that, and said "You're right about my spark, but remember this sparks hide more in the deep and took time to reach it... I wonder that  your honor sence forbide you a treachoury stab... So I'll go first"  Kali walked to the cave's entrance she turned and looking to Azure Blade said "You're the most kind enemy that I've met, take care, I want to fight with you the next time that I see you... So see you next time..."
Kali left the cave and took off. Soon she was flying towards blackfortress
  warriorazure <wingedwarrior41@...> wrote: AzureBlade smiled at Mistra. He was glad she accepted Kali's 
conditions.

AzureBlade: Thank you, Mistra. Now, Kali, I think we have fulfilled 
your wishes. If you would have the gratefulness to let us go...

<P> Kali::
<P>Kali did a nice smile, She didn't often do that, and said "You're right about my spark, but remember this sparks hide more in the deep and took time to reach it... I wonder that  your honor sence forbide you a treachoury stab... So I'll go first"  Kali walked to the cave's entrance she turned and looking to Azure Blade said "You're the most kind enemy that I've met, take care, I want to fight with you the next time that I see you... So see you next time..."
<P>Kali left the cave and took off. Soon she was flying towards blackfortress
